General.Name: Archer Aviation Inc
General.Description: Archer Aviation Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs and develops aircraft and related technologies and services in the United States and internationally. It operates through the commercial and defense sectors. The company offers electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft for use in urban air mobility (UAM) and Archer Direct, a commercial aircraft. It also provides direct-to-consumer aerial ride share services and maintenance and repair services. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in San Jose, California.
General.Address: 190 West Tasman Drive, San Jose, CA, United States, 95134
